attributes.name: BOM
attributes.description: Bill of materials for the items relating to a specific project, building, product development, etc.

attributes.name: averageCost
attributes.description: The average cost of the inventory item.

attributes.name: binId
attributes.description: ID associated with Bin for recording inventory.

attributes.name: binLocation
attributes.description: The location of the smallest addressable unit of space in a warehouse where the inventory gets stored.

attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: closingStockQuantity
attributes.description: The quantity of the closing stock at the end of a reporting period.

attributes.name: closingStockValue
attributes.description: The value of the closing stock at the end of a reporting period.

attributes.name: countedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the person carrying out the counting of inventory.

attributes.name: currentValuation
attributes.description: Current valuation of the inventory.

attributes.name: defaultInventoryMethod
attributes.description: Default method used for calculating value of inventory.

attributes.name: defaultStockingUnitOfMeasure
attributes.description: Default number of units of measure ordered for this inventory product.

attributes.name: displayOnFront
attributes.description: The identifier or mark to identify the inventory displayed on the item or product.

attributes.name: glAssetAccount
attributes.description: Name of GL Account on which inventory asset value has been posted.

attributes.name: glCostAccount
attributes.description: GL account to which the inventory list cost is posted.

attributes.name: inventoryABCCode
attributes.description: Grouping of the inventory into three categories "A" - most important, "B" - less important and "C" - least important.

attributes.name: inventoryBarcode
attributes.description: ID/code associated with identifying Inventory.

attributes.name: inventoryClass
attributes.description: Class of inventory to which the asset is assigned, e.g. raw materials, work-in-progress or finished goods.

attributes.name: inventoryCost
attributes.description: Cost of inventory at purchase in functional or header currency.

attributes.name: inventoryCostMethod
attributes.description: Identified cost procedure for booking or recording the inventory.

attributes.name: inventoryDescription
attributes.description: The description of the inventory item.

attributes.name: inventoryHeldForCustomers
attributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for a customer.

attributes.name: inventoryHeldForOthers
attributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for someone other than a customer.

attributes.name: inventoryHeldForSuppliers
attributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for a supplier.

attributes.name: inventoryItemCode
attributes.description: Code used to identify inventory items.

attributes.name: inventoryListPrice
attributes.description: Usual or standard price of inventory item.

attributes.name: inventoryProductId
attributes.description: The inventory product identifier in the inventory transactions.

attributes.name: inventoryProductName
attributes.description: Defining the inventory or the product brand acquired.

attributes.name: inventoryProductType
attributes.description: The type of inventory products e.g. raw material, semi-finished and finished goods.

attributes.name: inventoryProductVariants
attributes.description: Product or item specifications, e.g. colour, size, etc.

attributes.name: inventoryPurchaseYearToDate
attributes.description: The value of the inventory purchased up to the reporting period or year to date.

attributes.name: inventoryPurchasingUOM
attributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory purchases.

attributes.name: inventorySellingUOM
attributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory sales.

attributes.name: inventorySoldYearToDate
attributes.description: The value of the inventory sold up to the reporting period or year to date.

attributes.name: inventoryStockingUOM
attributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory stocking.

attributes.name: lastCountDate
attributes.description: The last count date of the inventory list.

attributes.name: lastDespatchedDate
attributes.description: The date inventory last despatched.

attributes.name: lastReceivedDate
attributes.description: The date inventory last received.

attributes.name: locationActiveFlag
attributes.description: Flag to identify whether a specific location for holding inventory is active or inactive.

attributes.name: locationCity
attributes.description: The physical city where the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationCode
attributes.description: A code by which inventory item location can be known as a shorthand.

attributes.name: locationCountry
attributes.description: The country where the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: locationDescription
attributes.description: Description of the location where the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationId
attributes.description: ID of the location of the Inventory.

attributes.name: locationLatitude
attributes.description: The latitude in degrees of the location of the inventory item.

attributes.name: locationLongitude
attributes.description: The longitude in degrees of the location of the inventory item.

attributes.name: locationParent
attributes.description: Parent or owner of the inventory location.

attributes.name: locationPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the building where the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationStateProvince
attributes.description: The state or province in which the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationStreet
attributes.description: The street of the address where the inventory item is located.

attributes.name: locationType
attributes.description: Type of the inventory location, e.g. warehouse, shop, storage, etc.

attributes.name: lotNumber
attributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

attributes.name: obsoleteOrDamagedInventory
attributes.description: Flag to identify if inventory is obsolete or damaged.

attributes.name: openingStockQuantity
attributes.description: The opening stock quantity of the inventory appearing at the beginning of the reporting period.

attributes.name: openingStockValue
attributes.description: The opening stock value of the inventory appearing at the beginning of the reporting period.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who owns the item.

attributes.name: preferredSupplier
attributes.description: The supplier that is preferred or considered in comparison to other vendors depending on price, functionality, performance, etc.

attributes.name: primaryManufacturer
attributes.description: Primary manufacturer of the item in inventory.

attributes.name: primaryManufacturerProductCode
attributes.description: Product code by which the primary manufacturer refers to the product.

attributes.name: primarySupplier
attributes.description: Primary supplier of the product.

attributes.name: primarySupplierProductCode
attributes.description: Product code by which the primary supplier refers to the product.

attributes.name: productGroup01
attributes.description: Product classified depending on the nature of business or operations, e.g. Rm, Non RM, etc.

attributes.name: productGroup02
attributes.description: Product classified depending on the nature of business or operations, e.g. Rm, Non RM, etc.

attributes.name: quantity
attributes.description: Quantity on inventory list.

attributes.name: quantityOnHandPhysicalCount
attributes.description: Count of the inventory physical quantity available for use.

attributes.name: quantityOnHandSystem
attributes.description: The inventory quantity on hand reflected in the system.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: serialNumber
attributes.description: Serial number for Inventory, used by manufacturer for identification.

attributes.name: specificCost
attributes.description: Actual specific cost of this individual item at time of purchase.

attributes.name: standardCost
attributes.description: Usual or standard cost of this item at purchase.

attributes.name: stockAccountCommodityCode
attributes.description: Code used to identify commodity held in inventory.

attributes.name: stockCharacteristic
attributes.description: The key features or nature of the stock in the inventory list.

attributes.name: stockCharacteristicValue
attributes.description: Value associated with specific stock characteristic.

attributes.name: supplierId
attributes.description: Identifier of the supplier from whom the inventory is purchased and to whom payment is due or from whom unused credits have been applied for. Must match the supplierId in SupplierMasterData.

attributes.name: thirdPartyFacility
attributes.description: ID or name of the third party facility used by the entity to host or utilise this item.

attributes.name: unitPrice
attributes.description: Cost or price of one unit.

attributes.name: uomToUOMBaseConversionFactor
attributes.description: Factor conversion of UOM with similar characteristic, e.g. for UOM of "hour, minute, second", the base UOM is "second".

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: writeDownDescription
attributes.description: Description of the inventory reduced value / write down description due to damage, theft, shrinking of market trends, etc.

attributes.name: writeDownFactor
attributes.description: Factor or identifier considered for the inventory reduction / written down value.
